Task name: [S1-001] Move JWT tokens from localStorage to httpOnly cookies
Description content: CRITICAL SECURITY FIX: Migrate authentication tokens from localStorage (XSS vulnerable) to httpOnly secure cookies. This prevents JavaScript access to tokens, eliminating XSS token theft attacks. CVSS 8.1 vulnerability.
Subtasks: Create cookie utility functions,Update auth service token storage,Update login handler to set cookies,Update logout to clear cookies,Update middleware to read from cookies,Update frontend to remove localStorage usage,Add SameSite and Secure flags,Test cross-origin scenarios

Description content: Add Cross-Site Request Forgery protection using double-submit cookie pattern or synchronizer tokens. All state-changing requests (POST/PUT/DELETE) must validate CSRF tokens.
Subtasks: Generate CSRF token on login,Add CSRF middleware to router,Create token validation logic,Update frontend to include CSRF header,Add CSRF token refresh mechanism,Test CSRF protection scenarios

Description content: Implement strict CSP headers to prevent XSS, clickjacking, and code injection attacks. Configure script-src, style-src, img-src, connect-src directives.
Subtasks: Define CSP policy rules,Add CSP middleware,Configure nonce for inline scripts,Update Next.js config for CSP,Test CSP violations reporting

Description content: Sanitize all user inputs to prevent SQL injection, XSS, and command injection. Implement recursive sanitization for nested objects.
